name: baseline-webpage
description: A simple React static site that is deployed to AWS using serverless.

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && export AWS_PROFILE=baseline-webpage && npx serverless deploy --verbose --stage dev --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=baseline-webpage" --param="bucketId=bsln-bucket-id"
scripts.remove:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=baseline-webpage && npx serverless remove --stage dev --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=baseline-webpage" --param="bucketId=bsln-bucket-id"
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && export AWS_PROFILE=baseline-webpage && npx serverless deploy --verbose --stage prod --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=baseline-webpage" --param="bucketId=bsln-bucket-id"
scripts.remove:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=baseline-webpage && npx serverless remove --stage prod --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=baseline-webpage" --param="bucketId=bsln-bucket-id"
scripts.info:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=baseline-webpage && npx serverless info --verbose --stage dev --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=baseline-webpage" --param="bucketId=bsln-bucket-id"
scripts.info:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=baseline-webpage && npx serverless info --verbose --stage prod --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=baseline-webpage" --param="bucketId=bsln-bucket-id"
